data.message:
Yesssss!

I' m no GALWAY GIRL, but hearing Ed Sheeran SING live would be PERFECT. Getting a little DRUNK and feeling his Voice travel through my BLOODSTREAM would be better than being apart of THE A TEAM. I'de be even HAPPIER to get a PHOTOGRAPH with him.

Maybe I'm just THINKING OUT LOUD, but I'd rather live in a LEGO HOUSE than a CASTLE ON THE HILL. If the castle collapses, it could change the SHAPE OF YOU. Just think about it.. HOW WOULD YOU FEEL ? 

I hope this is legit, because I SEE FIRE when these competitions DON'T follow through. 
Especially because Facebook.. YOU NEED ME, I DON'T NEED YOU.

replies.message: Hi Sharne, can you please send us a private message as we might have something for you ;)
